name: 2nd Annual Dubai International Musculoskeletal Medicine Congress
content: After the outstanding success of the first meeting. We would like to announce that the 2nd Annual Dubai International Musculoskeletal Medicine Congress, will be held during 09 â€“ 10 March, 2018 in Dubai, UAE. The 2-day congress is the main platform in the Middle East covering latest trends and developments in the field of musculoskeletal medicine and rehabilitation. The congress aims to improve the quality and effectiveness of rehabilitation, prevention and treatment of musculoskeletal health problems. It covers various fields related to physical medicine, musculoskeletal medicine, neuro muscular medicine, paediatric rehabilitation and more by leading local and global experts in the field. Do not pass up the opportunity to foster innovation and knowledge in the field of physical rehabilitation Website URL www.dimmc.com Facebook URL https://www.facebook.com/MusculoskeletalMedicineProfessionals/ Twitter URL https://twitter.com/MSKMedicineConf Twitter Hashtag (#) #MSKMedicineConf email info@dimmc.com
